div.p:
(Translation: P. L. Bat. 25.73)
(cross) To brother Phib (cross) and the other deacons ... (cross) Andronicus has paid through me, Jacob, for the belated food-allowance, on the account of Tybi, for 2 artabas of wheat (?): 1, one carat in gold. Written in the month of Tybi, xth, of the 8th indiction. I have signed.
